resources.string:
The Heavy Metal App is designed to provide guidance and support for physical exercise and general fitness goals. However, the content provided, including workout routines, nutritional advice, and health tips, is for informational purposes only and should not be considered a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. 

Before starting any fitness program, consult a qualified healthcare provider, especially if you have any pre-existing medical conditions or concerns.


By using the app, you acknowledge that engaging in physical activities carries inherent risks, including but not limited to injury, strain, or physical discomfort. The app and its developers are not liable for any injuries, health problems, or other damages that may occur as a result of your use of the app.


Safety Instructions:


Consult Your Doctor: Before beginning any new fitness program, especially if you have medical conditions, injuries, or are new to exercise, consult with a healthcare professional.


Warm Up and Cool Down: Always warm up before and cool down after your workouts to prevent injury.


Listen to Your Body: If you experience pain, dizziness, shortness of breath, or discomfort, stop immediately and seek medical advice.


Stay Hydrated: Drink plenty of water before, during, and after exercise.


Use Proper Form: Follow the appâ€™s instructions carefully to maintain correct posture and technique during exercises.


Progress Gradually: Start with beginner levels if you are new to fitness, and gradually increase the intensity and duration of workouts as your strength and endurance improve.


Use Appropriate Equipment: Ensure that you have the right fitness equipment and that it is in good condition to avoid injury.


Be Aware of Your Surroundings: If performing exercises outdoors or in shared spaces, ensure you have enough room and a safe environment to avoid accidents.


By proceeding with the use of this app, you agree to do so at your own risk.
I Confirm I have read and understood this disclaimer
